::Kaiser::
       He turns around in his chair at the tactical station on the bridge of 
Blackheart's ship.  "So you're the commander on this mission."  He grunts but 
whether it is a grunt of satisfaction or contempt is anyone's guess.  This 
doubt would have been his death sentence had he been anyone else.  But he was 
a former Tripred General hauled out of retirement to train the new troops.  
It's just bad form to execute a general, even retired ones.

--part1_80.23fa9265.2af95e14_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
